00020 /* include headers defining the interface of the sources. */
00021 #include "settingsform.h"
00022 #include "globaldeclarations.h"
00023 #include "appsettings.h"
00024 
00025 /* creates the application's settings gui form. */
00026 SettingsForm::SettingsForm(const appSettings sets, QWidget *parent) : QDialog(parent) {
00027     /* store the application's settings. */
00028     this->sets = sets;
00029 
00030     /* create the appropriate settings line edits, labels and set buddies. */
00031     parkingCapacitySpin = new QSpinBox;
00032     parkingCapacityLabel = new QLabel(parkingCapacityLabelStr);
00033     parkingCapacityLabel->setBuddy(parkingCapacitySpin);
00034 
00035     chargeTimesliceSpin = new QSpinBox;
00036     chargeTimesliceLabel = new QLabel(chargeTimesliceLabelStr);
00037     chargeTimesliceLabel->setBuddy(chargeTimesliceSpin);
00038 
00039     chargePerSliceSpin = new QDoubleSpinBox;
00040     chargePerSliceLabel = new QLabel(chargePerSliceLabelStr);
00041     chargePerSliceLabel->setBuddy(chargePerSliceSpin);
00042 
00043     chargePrecisionSpin = new QSpinBox;
00044     chargePrecisionLabel = new QLabel(chargePrecisionLabelStr);
00045     chargePrecisionLabel->setBuddy(chargePrecisionSpin);
00046 
00047     /* create the management buttons. */
00048     saveButton = new QPushButton(saveButtonStr);
00049     closeButton = new QPushButton(closeButtonStr);
00050 
00051     /* add the buttons in a button box dialog. */
00052     buttonBox = new QDialogButtonBox;
00053     buttonBox->addButton(saveButton, QDialogButtonBox::ActionRole);
00054     buttonBox->addButton(closeButton, QDialogButtonBox::AcceptRole);
00055 
00056     /* set up some ranges for spinboxes. */
00057     parkingCapacitySpin->setRange(MIN_PARKING_CAPACITY, MAX_PARKING_CAPACITY);
00058     parkingCapacitySpin->setValue(sets.parkingCapacity);
00059 
00060     chargeTimesliceSpin->setRange(MIN_TIMESLICE, MAX_TIMESLICE);
00061     chargeTimesliceSpin->setValue(sets.timeslice);
00062     chargeTimesliceSpin->setSuffix(" sec(s)");
00063 
00064     chargePerSliceSpin->setRange(MIN_CHARGE_PER_TIMESLICE, MAX_CHARGE_PER_TIMESLICE);
00065     chargePerSliceSpin->setSingleStep(DEF_CHARGE_SPINBOX_STEP);
00066     chargePerSliceSpin->setValue(sets.chargePerTimeslice);
00067 
00068     chargePrecisionSpin->setRange(MIN_CHARGE_PRECISION, MAX_CHARGE_PRECISION);
00069     chargePrecisionSpin->setValue(sets.chargePrecision);
00070 
00071     /* focus the close button. */
00072     closeButton->setFocus();
00073 
00074     /* set the signals/slots for the buttons' events. */
00075     connect(saveButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(writeSettings()));
00076     connect(closeButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(accept()));
00077 
00078     /* create a table grid. */
00079     QGridLayout *mainLayout = new QGridLayout;
00080 
00081     /* add the following objects in the appropriate position in the grid. */
00082     mainLayout->addWidget(parkingCapacityLabel, 0, 0);
00083     mainLayout->addWidget(parkingCapacitySpin, 1, 0);
00084     mainLayout->addWidget(chargeTimesliceLabel, 2, 0);
00085     mainLayout->addWidget(chargeTimesliceSpin, 3, 0);
00086     mainLayout->addWidget(chargePerSliceLabel, 4, 0);
00087     mainLayout->addWidget(chargePerSliceSpin, 5, 0);
00088     mainLayout->addWidget(chargePrecisionLabel, 6, 0);
00089     mainLayout->addWidget(chargePrecisionSpin, 7, 0);
00090     mainLayout->addWidget(buttonBox, 8, 0);
00091 
00092     /* set some GUI options for the table grid. */
00093     mainLayout->setRowMinimumHeight(8, 35);
00094     mainLayout->setRowStretch(8, 1);
00095     mainLayout->setColumnStretch(2, 1);
00096 
00097     /* do not allow to resize the form. */
00098     mainLayout->setSizeConstraint (QLayout::SetFixedSize);
00099 
00100     /* set the layout for the settings form. */
00101     setLayout(mainLayout);
00102 
00103     /* set the text of the form's window. */
00104     setWindowTitle(setsWinTitleStr);
00105 }
00106 
00107 /* close the form. */
00108 void
00109 SettingsForm::done(const int result) {
00110     /* return from the form. */
00111     QDialog::done(result);
00112 }
00113 
00114 /* write the settings of the program. */
00115 void SettingsForm::writeSettings() {
00116     QSettings s(setsAppOrg, setsAppName);
00117 
00118     s.beginGroup("parking");
00119     s.setValue("capacity", parkingCapacitySpin->value());
00120     s.endGroup();
00121 
00122     s.beginGroup("payment");
00123     s.setValue("timeslice", chargeTimesliceSpin->value());
00124     s.setValue("charge_per_timeslice", chargePerSliceSpin->value());
00125     s.setValue("charge_precision", chargePrecisionSpin->value());
00126     s.endGroup();
00127 
00128     /* try to write down the settings. */
00129     s.sync();
00130 
00131     /* if the app cannot write the settings. */
00132     if (s.status() != QSettings::NoError) {
00133         /* show a message. */
00134         QMessageBox::critical(this, infoMsgTitleStr, cantWriteSetsStr);
00135 
00136         /* terminate the program. */
00137         exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00138     }
00139 }
